numbered_ace_sentences: 3. Legacy status affects the admission percentage.
4. If a person has high wealth and a legacy status then the admission percentage is high.
5. If a person has neither wealth nor a legacy status then the admission percentage is high.
7. Some people think that having money and a legacy status has a stigma.
8. Some people think that having neither money nor a legacy status has a stigma.
9. I ask where this stigma came from.
10. I ask whether admission depends on both wealth and legacy status.
11. I ask whether admission depends only on wealth.
12. I ask whether rich people use donations to reduce taxes.
13. I am an up-and-coming college applicant.
14. It is valuable for me to see my category.
15. I compare myself with other applicants.
18. Colleges look for an all-or-nothing case.
